name: Uniqhand
tag_list: ecommerce, p2p, handmade, craft-supplies, marketplace, russia
overview:
Uniqhand (uniqhand.ru) – is a Russian marketplace for artisans and buyers, which makes it possible to buy and sell handmade goods. Uniqhand makes trade easy, safe and enjoyable for all participants.

Uniqhand works wonders - it not only brings you the exclusive goods, but also allows you to buy them, allows you to look at familiar things in a new way, to become the sole owner of a unique instance. Here - only the best and most creative goods that carries a bit of emotional mood of each wizard. Original works of thousands of artists from all over Russia - from the interior elements to tiny clips, scented plush dolls and jewelry. One hand movement - and liked item goes to the cart. It remains only to specify the method of delivery and payment, and the world stands on one more happy man!
